summary:
ISSUES
Critical:
- "How It Works" page failed the test: Investigate why the metrics are missing for this page and address any issues found to ensure proper monitoring and performance.

issues.message: "How It Works" page failed the test
issues.recommendation: Investigate why the metrics are missing for this page and address any issues found to ensure proper monitoring and performance.
Consider optimizing images, minifying CSS/JavaScript, and reducing HTTP requests to improve homepage load time.

insights: The TTFB (Time to First Byte) is consistently low across all pages, indicating that the server is responding quickly.
FCP (First Contentful Paint) is relatively high on the homepage, suggesting that content is taking longer to appear on the page.

The Blog and Pricing pages have the shortest load times, providing a good user experience. Focusing on optimizing the homepage can help improve the overall user experience and ensure consistent performance across all pages.
